Description.$t: Doug's always been content to sit back and let the world pass by. Why stress out when you've got a skateboard and a hackey sack? But with Prom right around the corner, he's realized this is his last chance to make it good. Thursday's not too late to get started, right?

GoalDescription.words: The only thing better than drifting through life is drifting through it with a friend. Maybe this would be a good time to make one.

TidBit.text: New friends in the last week of high school? I guess you can teach ol' Doug new tricks.
Word is Doug is making friends and chilling out this week.

GoalDescription.words: Isn't prom supposed to be a time for peace and love, or something? It's time for Doug to do his part.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make Doug ###DOUG### do two generally nice things

TidBit.text: Turns out underneath that cap Doug really is a sweet guy. Who knew?
Word from the yearbook staff: Doug might get voted Nicest Slacker.

GoalDescription.words: There have always been some who've irked Doug since, like, elementary school. This just might be the chance to put them in their place.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make Doug ###DOUG### do two generally mean things

TidBit.text: People have been muttering about that Doug guy. What's his deal? He used to be so nice.
What's up with Doug? Word in the halls is he's been kind of a jerk lately.

GoalDescription.words: Only a day to sweep someone off their feet before Prom... better get to wooing!

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Get Doug ###DOUG### to start dating ###DATING### someone

TidBit.text: Apparently Doug might have a date for the Prom after all. Wild!
Love is in the air around Doug, or maybe that's just the patchouli.

Level.title: Thursday: Last Chance
Level.$c: Crap, it's Thursday ALREADY? After sleeping through first period as usual, Doug 'boarded to school as reality started seeping back. It's only ONE DAY before the Prom and Doug is so totally unprepared for the momentous night. With only one day left, he'll have to act fast to make his mark.

Description.$c: The big night's almost here, and Doug is far from ready. There's still a few hours to seal the deals before the curtain drops.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, hey Doug! %greeting%! I'm a little surprised to see you here!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why would you say that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It just doesn't seem like the Prom is really your type of thing, yah know?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, yeah. Totally. I just kinda had a bit of a change of heart yesterday - I guess.
I mean, like, I may not have achieved everything I wanted to. But that's just me, man. I'd rather chillax than stress out over deadlines.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, Doug. I'm so going to miss you when I'm famous.

Instantiation.name: Ending A: Pacifism is the New, Cool Thing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug! Heyyyyy man! How you been?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you know. Just kickin' it. Coastin'.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's so cool! How are you always so stress-free and chill!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You just have to relax, man. Stop worrying about trying to impose your will on the world. The world will come to you if you want it to.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dude, that's crazy. You should start a religion or something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, man. It's something everyone has to discover in themselves.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're blowing my mind, man. Hey, I'm glad we're friends.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Totally man. Peace out.

Instantiation.name: Ending B: A Little Kindness, Goes a Long Way.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yo Doug... uh... so I was thinking about that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That was just... really cool of you, man. Sometimes... I wish I could be that guy, who does nice things.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: There's nothing stopping you, man. Nothing at all. Just be yourself.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uhh.. heh heh... but what if deep down, you know, I'm really just a total jerk who likes making fun of dorks? No offense.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry, man, you have to figure that out for yourself.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Like algebra.
Doug... some of us have been kinda worried about you. Is everything all right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah. Why wouldn't it be?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, like that time when %toc1%? That was pretty un-Doug.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's it to you? Who are you to tell me what I should be like? Why don't you leave me alone, dipweed!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug... We're just worri-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well don't be. Just leave me alone, alright? Is that 'Doug' enough for you?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... I'm sorry. I guess it's easier to just put each other in little boxes than try to actually understand what someone else is going through.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Or maybe I'm just more of a bad boy than you losers ever gave me credit for. Hey, enjoy your Prom. I'm out.

Instantiation.name: Ending D: A Romantic Dream Come True

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, my love. I'm so glad we could spend tonight like this together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug, my sweet. Truly, this is a night to be remembered forever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, my dearest. You are the world's most beautiful and majestic lady of them all.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug, my knight. You are the chillest and kindest fellow I've ever known.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, my queen. I'm so happy you notice my deepest, most important qualities.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug, my king. Can we stop this silliness and go dance?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Definitely.

Ending.name: All Around Cool Kid
Ending.$c: Big Buddy Doug + Super Nice Guy

Instantiation.name: Ending AB: The Coolest, Nicest Kid on the Block

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doug! Man, I was just thinking about you and here you are, at the Prom - with us.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, guess so. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just wanted to say hi, man. I mean, this might be our last night all together as a class! And you've helped make some great memories this year.
I mean, when %toc1%... I was like, 'That's so D-star.'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: D-star...?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, you like it? It's what we're calling you now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I've never had a nickname before... hey, thanks %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No problem D-star. Catch you later!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Peace out.

Ending.name: Bad Boys Get All the Babes
Ending.$c: Last Minute Date + Kinda Mean Dude

Instantiation.name: Ending DC: Bad Boys are Sexy

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, if it isn't my sexy, little stud-muffin Doug.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey babe. Yeah, thought I'd drop in, see what the big deal is about this prom thing. Not that I care.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why don't you spend it with me, love? I'd just die to dance with you tonight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Eh, I dunno. I was maybe gonna skate downtown, break some windows, see what kind of trouble I could get into.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Awww, don't go. Be a good boy and stay here with me. It's our special night!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Special? Whatever. It's just a meaningless ritual to distract us all from the fact that now we're unemployed and have learned no useful skills. Let's go burn something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're so hot when you get all bad, stud muffin. Hey, remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Someone had to do it, baby. Someone had to do it.

Ending.name: Something Special
Ending.$c: Big Buddy Doug + Last Minute Date

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Man, I can't believe we're finally here at our senior prom. We made it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Totally, %gender(r,my handsome man,lady love)%. And I couldn't imagine spending it with a more awesome %gender(r,dude,babe)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Same here. When this week started, I never thought I'd end it with such a sweet, kind, handsome man.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Aww... you're makin' me blush.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I feel like we have something that's gonna last, you know? I mean, this isn't just a fling. We're friends too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Next you're gonna say we should get %gender(r,twinner,his and hers)% skateboards.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're on, hot shot.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey... can I kiss you?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You damn well better.
